Currently many staffies are being mistaken for pit bulls and are being put down under the dangerous dog act, under the current guidelines any dog that looks anywhere near a pit bull and have the same leg length are being put down, i think their needs to be better guidelines to save our dogs from being killed, a lot of the dogs considered to be pit bulls from the supposed experts are not, and any dog that does not show any aggression should not be put down,
the experts on the dogs  should also widen their aggression tests.
Instead of banning  or killing an innocent dog they should help owners to cope with any breed of dog whether they are considered to be dangerous or not.

sign our petition to help save our dogs being put down for no reason at all.
Thank you
